Ogre::MouseMotionTarget Class Reference

std::set< MouseMotionListener * > mRemovedListeners

Detailed Description

Handles the adding and removing of MouseMotionListeners.

Remarks:
Components that process the Mouse Motion Event should subclass this class and call processMouseMotionEvent when that event is identified.
